page.title: 19Attitudes Littlebourne Area
page.content: The following are some of the topics which have interested us recently. The siting of the local radio mast caused great controversy, it eventually settled in Littlebourne. The blocking of right of way by the mill wheel Wickhambreux has caused much feeling and the whole village has united to have it restored. In L'bourne the loss of the VILLAGE POUND by its being sold to developers for building was very much depracated, the village is much poorer visually + historically because of it. The fate of the 12th C Barn still hangs in the balance. In Ickham the periodic flooding due to the removal of the field hedges + the leaky state of the village pond are topical.Traffic is a special nuisance, all types speed through the village creating noise and dust. The large TIR lorries hurtle along narrow roads
